text:
I donâ€™t think people fully appreciate how bullish this is for the next era of defense built around AI, drones & space.

The battles of tomorrow will be decided by who controls intelligence, secures infrastructure & dominates the digital battlefield so any incremental increase in the 2027 defense budget is far more likely to flow into those domains.

2026 WILL BE THE YEAR OF SPACE

Orbital Launch (access to space)
â€¢ $SPACEX enables low-cost, high-cadence launch that underpins the entire ecosystem
â€¢ $RKLB provides dedicated launch and integrated space services for small and mid-size missions
â€¢ $FLY, $SPCE, $ULA expand launch capacity across different mission profiles

Satellite Operators (demand layer)
â€¢ $PL, $BKYS supply earth-observation & intelligence data
â€¢ $AMZN (Project Kuiper) builds global broadband infrastructure in LEO
â€¢ $ASTS building the communications layer that monetizes space-based connectivity
â€¢ $VSAT, $SPIR, $SATL support maritime, aviation & specialized connectivity
â€¢ $TSAT, $GSAT deliver satellite communications & spectrum-driven services

Space Infrastructure (on-orbit systems & services)
â€¢ $LUNR provides lunar & deep-space mission infrastructure
â€¢ $VOYG supports spacecraft services & mission operations
â€¢ $MNTS handles in-space logistics, transport & orbital services

Manufacturing & Supply (industrial backbone)
â€¢ $LMT, $NOC, $RTX, $BA build spacecraft, launch systems & national-security platforms
â€¢ $BWXT supplies nuclear components critical to space & defense systems
â€¢ $LHX, $TDY, $HON deliver avionics, sensors & mission-critical hardware
â€¢ $RDW, $KULR support space-grade materials, robotics & thermal systems
â€¢ $KTOS, $ESLT enable defense-aligned space & autonomous systems

$CRWD agreed to acquire identity security startup SGNL for ~$740M expanding Falconâ€™s identity layer.

It points to where the AI economy is heading where identity isnâ€™t just people logging in but AI agents, services & autonomous systems acting on behalf of the business.

$BE shares are moving higher after $AEP disclosed a ~$2.7B solid oxide fuel cell order backed by a 20-year offtake for all output from a Wyoming plant.

The deal builds on AEPâ€™s prior partnership with Bloom covering up to 1GW of capacity.

$ACHR said itâ€™s building its next aviation AI stack on $NVDA IGX Thor by integrating the safety-focused module into future aircraft.

The first demo will take place at Archerâ€™s Hawthorne hub in LA centered on predictive awareness, integration & autonomy-ready flight controls.

10 WAYS TO CAPTURE A $1.5T U.S. DEFENSE BUDGET IN 2027

1. $PLTR powers command, control & real-time decision-making by fusing data into actionable battlefield intelligence.

2. $ONDS builds the secure, jam-resistant communication networks drones need as autonomous fleets scale across contested environments.

3. $AVAV is the dominant U.S. military drone prime directly capturing higher procurement as ISR & strike missions expand.

4. $KTOS specializes in low-cost, attritable unmanned systems designed for the kind of high-loss, high-tempo warfare larger budgets enable.

5. $DPRO provides drone training, operations & deployment services so think the execution layer that scales alongside hardware spend.

6. $UMAC develops software that coordinates multiple drones simultaneously by turning individual platforms into autonomous fleets.

7. $RCAT designs rugged tactical drones used by frontline units where higher budgets drive repeat, consumable demand.

8. $NOC integrates drones into large-scale autonomous defense systems across ISR, missile defense & space platforms.

9. $RTX supplies sensors, guidance & targeting systems that turn drones from platforms into precision weapons.

10. $LMT anchors the transition by embedding unmanned systems into next-generation air, space & missile architectures.

$NVDA TO BE THE MOST PROFITABLE TECH COMPANY BY 2027

Profit estimates: 
â€¢ Nvidia ~$213B
â€¢ $GOOGL ~$178B
â€¢ $MSFT ~$174B
â€¢ $AAPL ~$157B
â€¢ $AMZN ~$124B

Source: 

trendforce.com/presscenter/nâ€¦

$NVDA just raised the bar on HBM4 by tightening Rubin specs to 11+ Gbps per pin & forcing $MU, SK hynix & Samsung to redesign memory samples.

With Blackwell demand overwhelming supply, Nvidia is leaning into GB300 & HBM3e by effectively pushing HBM4 production into Q2 2026.

Appreciate you Charles for having me on today!

We covered:
â€¢ $AMD emerging as the second source of the AI economy

â€¢ $NVDA laying out the blueprint for the operating system of the AI economy
â€¢ $META & $AMZN winning in AI through distribution, data, and workflow control
â€¢ $EOSE as a winner from AI data centers creating extreme load swings that long-duration zinc storage is built to handle

2026 continues to be the year companies push into real world AI.

The market cap of the Mag 7 is $21.5T... both the Russell 2000 and S&P 400 Mid Cap combined equals $7T. Selling 1% of the Mag 7 to buy "the field" is a 3% move.

When you wake up, do you read MSM narratives or numbers?

I read: closing prices, volume vs. averages, volatility regimes, TRADE/TREND signals

What I DON'T read: "Why Markets Are Worried About..." articles from people who don't timestamp positions.

Stories sell ads (if you're dumb enough to click on them). Numbers compound capital

GraniteShares announced distribution rates for the YieldBOOSTâ„¢ Gold Miners ETF (NUGY) as of January 08, 2026
$NUGY

GraniteShares announced distribution rates for all GraniteShares YieldBOOSTâ„¢ ETFs today, as listed in the table below.

(1) Distribution per share: As of January 07, 2026
(2) The Distribution Rate is shown as of January 09, 2026. It is the annual rate an investor would receive if the most recent distribution remained the same going forward. The rate represents a single distribution from the fund and does not represent total return to the fund. The distribution rate is calculated by annualizing the most recent distribution and dividing it by the most recent NAV.
(3) ROC or Return of Capital indicates how much the distribution reflects an investor's initial investment. The figures shown for each Fund in the table above are estimates based on the latest 19a1 forms and may later be determined to be taxable net investment income, short-term gains, long-term gains (to the extent permitted by law), or return of capital. Actual amounts and sources for tax reporting will depend upon the Fund's investment activities during the remainder of the fiscal year and may be subject to changes based on tax regulations. Your broker will send you a Form 1099-DIV for the calendar year to tell you how to report these distributions for federal income tax purposes.
Ex Date: The first day a stock without the right to receive the upcoming distribution
Payment Date: Date on which the distribution is paid to eligible shareholders.

I know what you're doing, I see it all too clear
I only taste the saline when I kiss away your tears
You really had me goin', wishing on a star
The black holes that surround you are heavier by far
I believed in your confusion, you were so completely torn
It must've been that yesterday was the day that I was born
There's not much to examine, nothing left to hide
You really can't be serious
If you have to ask me why I say goodbye
'Cause I am barely breathing
And I can't find the air
Don't know who I'm kidding
Imagining you care
And I could stand here waiting
A fool for another day
I don't suppose it's worth the price
You're worth the price, the price that I would pay
And everyone keeps asking, "What's it all about?"
I used to be so certain and I can't figure out
What is this attraction? 
I only feel the pain
Nothing left to reason and only you to blame
Will it ever change?
'Cause I am barely breathing
And I can't find the air
Don't know who I'm kidding
Imagining you care
And I could stand here waiting
A fool for another day
I don't suppose it's worth the price
You're worth the price, the price that I would pay
But I'm thinking it over anyway
I'm thinking it over anyway
I've come to find I may never know
Your changing mind, is it friend or foe?
I rise above or sink below
With every time you come and go
Please don't come and go
'Cause I am barely breathing
And I can't find the air
Don't know who I'm kidding
Imagining you care
And I could stand here waiting
A fool for another day
I don't suppose it's worth the price
You're worth the price, the price that I would pay
But I'm thinking it over anyway
I'm thinking it over anyway
And I know what you're doin'
I see it all too clear
